title: Dyuers frutful gatherynges of scripture and declarynge of fayth and workes of the lawe
author: Hamilton, Patrick, 1504?-1528.
publisher: Imprented in fletestrete by me Robert Redman,
notes: An edition of the translation from the Latin of "Patrick's Places" by John Frith.
Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Identified as STC 12733 on UMI microfilm.
Imperfect; title page lacking; some pages stained.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
